text: Somatics is a concept in alternative medicine where the human body and the movements relates with kinesthetic sense. Thomas Louis Hanna coined the term somatics in 1976. Ginot, Isabelle (2010. From Shusterman’s Somaesthetics to a Radical Epistemology of Somatics (PDF). Dance Research Journal. 42 (1): 12–29. Soma means "the body as perceived from within". == References == Category:Alternative medicine
title: Somatics
